doyoumind.readers.binary_reader module¶

class doyoumind.readers.binary_reader.Reader(path, zipped=True)¶

Bases: object

An implementation of the reader for files in binary format. For full documentation on the functions, see the main Reader class.

doyoumind.readers.reader module¶

class doyoumind.readers.reader.Reader(path, format, zipped=True)¶

Bases: object

A class representing an objects that reads the client’s sample. :param reader: the implemented reader :type reader: dynamic

read_hello()¶

read the ‘hello’ message. NOTE: we implement read_hello using read_user, since they have the same content exactly. if they’ll become different we’ll implement them differently, and use the Hello class from hello.proto.

Returns

hello object

Return type

doyoumind_pb2.User

Returns

the snapshot

Return type

doyoumind_pb2.Snapshot

read_user()¶

Returns

the user

Return type

doyoumind_pb2.User
